title: What do scientists call spiders? - Quora

response.answer_text: I call them …”spiders” or if I know the species or common name I will call them that, Spiders are members of Kingdom Animala, Phylum Arthodopa, Subphylum Chelicerata, Class Arachnida, and Order Araneae. In writing a scientific paper or response to Quora I might refer to them as “Arachnids” - strictly speaking this is not accurate because the Arachnids include non spiders like ticks, mites, and scorpions. Araneaeds is more accurate but I have seldom heard it used.
